name: 5 Minute Fudgy Chocolate Microwave Cake
description: Need a dessert pronto? Stir this up in the pan and 5 minutes later you're eating a delicious fudgy cake.
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup semisweet or bittersweet chocolate chips

recipeInstructions.text: Combine flour, 1/2 cup plus 2 tablespoons cocoa, 1/2 cup sugar, baking powder, and salt in a 1 1/2 quart shallow microwave safe dish.

Add egg yolks, butter, vanilla, chocolate chips, and water to the mix, and stir until almost combined (batter will be lumpy). Stir remaining 2 tablespoons cocoa and remaining 1/4 cup sugar in a small bowl and sprinkle over batter.
Microwave on high power until puffed, bubbling, and set (but still slightly jiggles), 4 to 5 minutes. Carefully remove from microwave and serve warm (see note).
